text: 4.29: Ef 5.4; Kor 3.8; 3.16; 4.6; 1 Te 5.11Nde fhura mbarkɨrga buni mbatɨgi, nde wari won kaathoorin nta suaŋ thari. Fhuvara. Buni vhuuiŋra nde kaathoorin kegɨp hɨv, guigira Zisas khothɨgi ndɨkndɨk havhargi fhuv gumgir kurkurav, mbe havharɨrga. Mba khesharigi buni, nta Fhe Bakɨmen kora muumbara ndiga zim, gumgi gu mbigi ana mbararagi.
